description: This file contains a client function for interacting with the Perplexity AI chat API, supporting streaming responses, API key management, and callback handling for chat response streams.
external_files: node: fetch API (built-in in modern environments or via polyfill)

methods.name: sendChatPrompt({ prompt, onToken, onStart, onComplete, onError })
methods.description: Exports an asynchronous function that sends a chat prompt to Perplexity AI's streaming chat API, handles API key retrieval from environment variables, manages streaming response processing, and invokes callbacks for tokens, start, completion, and errors.

ctags.name: sendChatPrompt
ctags.pattern: /^export async function sendChatPrompt({ prompt, onToken, onStart, onComplete, onError }) {$/
